name: simulate-switching-workspaces-on-active-monitor
description: Simulates switching the workspace on the active monitor only. Ctrl+Alt+q switches to the previous workspace, Ctrl+Alt+a switches to the next
author: Michele Da Ros <darosmic@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run schemas && npm run build:typescript && npm run copy-assets
scripts.submit: npm run build && cd dist/ && zip -r ~/simulate-switching-workspaces-on-active-monitor.zip *
scripts.install: npm run build && rm -rf ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/simulate-switching-workspaces-on-active-monitor@micheledaros.com/ && cp -r dist/ ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/simulate-switching-workspaces-on-active-monitor@micheledaros.com/
